meaningMnemonic: Remember how 直行 is "nonstop"? Well, with 直航 it's the same thing, but it's only used for flights and boat trips, making this a <vocabulary>nonstop flight</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>direct voyage</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
